title: CyberConnectÂçèËÆÆ: ‰∏∫Web 3.0ÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Á§æ‰∫§ÂõæË∞±Âü∫Á°ÄËÆæÊñΩ
body:
ÂÖ®ÁêÉÁ§æ‰∫§Â™í‰ΩìÂ∑®Â§¥ÁöÑÂ¥õËµ∑Ôºå‰ΩøÂæóÈõÜ‰∏≠ÂºèÁöÑÊäÄÊúØcartelsÂèØ‰ª•Êª•Áî®Áî®Êà∑Êï∞ÊçÆÔºå‰æµÁäØÁî®Êà∑ÈöêÁßÅÔºåÂÆûË°åÂÆ°Êü•Âà∂Â∫¶„ÄÇÂâëÊ°•ÂàÜÊûêÂÖ¨Âè∏ÁöÑ‰∏ÄÈ°πÁ†îÁ©∂ÊòæÁ§∫ÔºåFacebookÂú®Êú™ÁªèÁî®Êà∑ÂêåÊÑèÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµ‰∏ãÊî∂ÈõÜ‰∫ÜÊï∞Áôæ‰∏áÁî®Êà∑ÁöÑÁ§æ‰∫§ÂõæË∞±Âíå‰∏™‰∫∫Ê°£Ê°àÔºå‰ª•‰øÉËøõÊîøÊ≤ªÂπøÂëäÔºå‰∏çÈÄÇÂΩìÂú∞Âà©Áî®‰∫Ü‰∏™‰∫∫Êï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÇÁõÆÂâç‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑWeb 2.0Á§æ‰∫§ÁΩëÁªúÁöÑÊôØËßÇÂ∑≤ÁªèÂÅèÁ¶ª‰∫Ü‰∏áÁª¥ÁΩëÂ§ßËßÑÊ®°ÂàÜÊï£‰ø°ÊÅØÁöÑÂéüÂàô„ÄÇ

‰Ωú‰∏∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Ëß£ÂÜ≥ÊñπÊ°àÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Â∏åÊúõÊèê‰æõ‰∏Ä‰∏™Âéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñ„ÄÅÊó†ÂÆ°Êü•ÂíåËá™Êàë‰∏ªÊùÉÁöÑÁ§æ‰∫§ÁΩëÁªúÔºåËøô‰∏éWeb 3.0Èù©ÂëΩÁöÑËÆ∫ÁÇπÊúÄ‰∏∫Êé•Ëøë„ÄÇÂú®Web3.0ÁöÑÈªéÊòéÔºåCyberConnectÂá∫Áé∞‰∫ÜÔºåÂàõÂª∫‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™Âéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑÁ§æ‰ºöÂõæË∞±ÂçèËÆÆÔºå‰∏∫Web3ÂíåMetaverseÁ§æ‰ºöÁΩëÁªúÊèê‰æõÂä®Âäõ„ÄÇ\*\*Êàë‰ª¨ÁöÑ‰ΩøÂëΩÊòØÂ∞ÜÁ§æ‰∫§ÂõæË∞±Êï∞ÊçÆÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÊùÉÂíå‰ΩøÁî®ÊùÉÂΩíËøòÁªôÁî®Êà∑ÔºåÂêåÊó∂‰∏∫ÊâÄÊúâWeb3.0ÂºÄÂèëËÄÖÊèê‰æõ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈõÜÊàêÂíåÂºÄÂèëÂü∫Á°ÄËÆæÊñΩ„ÄÇ

**web3.0Ë∑ØÁ∫øÂõæ**

‰ª•Â§™ÂùäÂå∫ÂùóÈìæÁöÑÁ™ÅÁ†¥ÊÄßÂàõÊñ∞Âú®‰∫é‰ª•Âéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑÊñπÂºèÊâßË°åÊô∫ËÉΩÂêàÁ∫¶ÔºåÂºÄÂêØ‰∫Ü‰∏éÊï∞Â≠óËµÑ‰∫ß‰∫íÂä®ÁöÑÂéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÂ∫îÁî®ÁöÑÁØáÁ´†„ÄÇÊàë‰ª¨ÁúãÂà∞‰∫ÜDeFi‰πãÂ§èÂíåNFT‰πãÂ§èÁöÑÊàêÂäü„ÄÇ‰ºóÂ§öÁöÑDappÂá∫Áé∞‰∫ÜÔºå‰øÉËøõ‰∫ÜÊï∞Â≠óËµÑ‰∫ßÁöÑ‰∫§Êòì„ÄÇ

Âè¶‰∏ÄÊñπÈù¢ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÂæàÈ´òÂÖ¥ÁúãÂà∞Âéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑUGCÔºàÁî®Êà∑‰∫ßÁîüÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπÔºâÂπ≥Âè∞Ë∂äÊù•Ë∂äÂèóÊ¨¢ËøéÔºåÂ¶Çmirror.xyzÂíåÂü∫‰∫éÂå∫ÂùóÈìæÁöÑÊ∏∏ÊàèÔºåÂ¶ÇAxie Infinity„ÄÇÊàë‰ª¨Áõ∏‰ø°ÔºåWeb 3.0Ë∑ØÁ∫øÂõæÁöÑ‰∏ã‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈáçË¶ÅÊ≠•È™§Â∞ÜÊòØÂéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑÁ§æ‰∫§ÁΩëÁªúÂíåÂü∫‰∫éÂå∫ÂùóÈìæÁöÑmetaverseÁöÑÂ¥õËµ∑„ÄÇÂéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑÁ§æ‰∫§ÂõæË∞±ÂçèËÆÆÂ∞ÜÊòØÂÆÉÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁªÑÊàêÈÉ®ÂàÜ„ÄÇ

Âú®Ê≤°ÊúâÂéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑÁ§æ‰∫§ÂõæË∞±ÂçèËÆÆÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµ‰∏ãÔºåÁõÆÂâçÁöÑÊ∏∏ÊàèÂíåÁ§æ‰∫§Â∫îÁî®ÈÉΩÊòØÈõÜ‰∏≠Â≠òÂÇ®Áî®Êà∑ËøûÊé•Êï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÇÁî®Êà∑ÊØèÊ¨°ÁôªÂΩïÂà∞‰∏Ä‰∏™Êñ∞ÁöÑÂ∫îÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÊó∂ÔºåÈÉΩÂøÖÈ°ªÁªèÂéÜÂ§öÊ¨°ÂàõÂª∫ËøûÊé•ÁöÑËøáÁ®ã„ÄÇÊÉ≥Ë±°‰∏Ä‰∏ãÔºåÂΩì‰Ω†ËøõÂÖ•Decentraland„ÄÅDark ForestÁîöËá≥OpenseaÊó∂Ôºå‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Á´ãÂç≥‰ªé‰Ω†ÁöÑÂú∞ÂùÄÁ∞ø‰∏≠ËÆ§Âá∫‰Ω†ÁöÑÊúãÂèãÔºå‰ªñ‰ª¨‰πüÂú®‰ΩøÁî®Ëøô‰∏™Â∫îÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÔºåËøôÂ∞ÜÊòØÂ§ö‰πàÊÉä‰∫∫ÁöÑ‰∫ãÊÉÖ„ÄÇÈÄöËøáCyberConnectÔºåÁî®Êà∑ÂèØ‰ª•Áî®‰ªñ‰ª¨ÁöÑÊï∞Â≠óËµÑ‰∫ß„ÄÅÈìæ‰∏äË∫´‰ªΩÂíåÁ§æ‰∫§ÂõæË∞±Âú®ÂêÑÁßçWeb 3.0 DappsÂíåÊ∏∏Êàè‰∏≠ÂÜ≤Êµ™ÔºåËÄå‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÊääÂØπÂÆÉ‰ª¨ÁöÑÊéßÂà∂ÊùÉ‰∫§Áªô‰ªª‰Ωï‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑ‰∏ÄÊñπ„ÄÇ

**CyberConnectÂçèËÆÆ**

**ÂçèËÆÆÊ¶ÇËø∞**

Êàë‰ª¨Êèê‰æõCyberConnectÔºåËøôÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Âéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑÂçèËÆÆÔºåÁî®‰∫éÂª∫Á´ãÂü∫‰∫éÂå∫ÂùóÈìæÂú∞ÂùÄÁöÑÁ§æ‰∫§Âõæ„ÄÇCyberConnectÂçèËÆÆÂ∞ÜÂÖ∑Êúâ‰ª•‰∏ãÁâπÁÇπÔºö

* **ÂÖ¨ÂºÄËÆøÈóÆ**ÔºöÂéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑÁ§æ‰∫§ÂõæË∞±Êï∞ÊçÆÂ∞ÜÂØπÊâÄÊúâDappsÂÖ¨ÂºÄÔºå‰Ωú‰∏∫ÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ‰ΩøÁî®Áî®Êà∑ËøûÊé•ÁöÑÈ¢ùÂ§ñÂäüËÉΩÔºå‰ª•ËææÂà∞Ë∂ÖË∂äÁé∞ÊúâÁî®Êà∑Âü∫Á°ÄÁöÑÁõÆÁöÑ„ÄÇ
* **Ëá™‰∏ªÊÄß**ÔºöËôΩÁÑ∂Á§æ‰∫§ÂõæË∞±Êï∞ÊçÆÊòØÂÖ¨ÂºÄÁöÑÔºå‰ΩÜÂè™ÊúâÁî®Êà∑ÂèØ‰ª•ÂÆåÂÖ®ÊéßÂà∂Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑÁ§æ‰∫§ÂõæË∞±ÔºåÂç≥Ê∑ªÂä†„ÄÅÂà†Èô§ÂíåÊõ¥Êñ∞ÈìæÊé•„ÄÇ
* **Âå∫ÂùóÈìæÊó†ÂÖ≥ÊÄß**ÔºöËØ•ÂçèËÆÆ‰∏çÊòØË¢´ÊùüÁºöÂú®‰∏Ä‰∏™Âçï‰∏ÄÁöÑÂå∫ÂùóÈìæ‰∏äÔºåËÄåÊòØ‰∏∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Â§öÈìæÁöÑÁîüÊÄÅÁ≥ªÁªüËÄåÊûÑÂª∫„ÄÇËØ•ÂäüËÉΩÁã¨Á´ã‰∫éÂå∫ÂùóÈìæÔºåÂ∞ÜÊîØÊåÅÊù•Ëá™ÊâÄÊúâÂå∫ÂùóÈìæÁöÑËøûÊé•„ÄÇ
* **Âéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÊ≤ªÁêÜ**ÔºöÂèó‰ª•Â§™ÂùäÊÑøÊôØÁöÑÂêØÂèëÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Â∞ÜÊã•Êä±ÂÆâÂÖ®„ÄÅÊó†ÊùÉÈôêÂíåÂéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÊ≤ªÁêÜÁöÑÁêÜÊÉ≥„ÄÇËØ•ÂçèËÆÆÁöÑÈïøÊúüÂèëÂ±ïÂ∞ÜÂèñÂÜ≥‰∫éÂéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑÊ≤ªÁêÜ„ÄÇ
* **‰ª£Â∏ÅÊøÄÂä±**Ôºö‰∏∫‰∫ÜÊîØÊåÅCyberConnectÂçèËÆÆÁöÑÈïøÊúüÂèëÂ±ïÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Â∞ÜÂú®Êó©ÊúüÈò∂ÊÆµÂºïÂÖ•‰ª£Â∏ÅÊøÄÂä±Ê®°ÂºèÔºå‰ª•ÂÖ¨Âπ≥Âú∞Â•ñÂä±ÊâÄÊúâÂ∏ÆÂä©Âª∫Á´ãÁ§æ‰∫§ÂõæË∞±ÁöÑÂèÇ‰∏éËÄÖ„ÄÇ

**‰ΩøÁî®Ê°à‰æã**

 Ê†πÊçÆÊàë‰ª¨ÁöÑÊ¶ÇÂøµÔºå‰∏Ä‰∏™Âéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑÁ§æ‰∫§ÂõæË∞±Ë¢´Ë°®Á§∫‰∏∫‰∏çÂêåÂå∫ÂùóÈìæÂú∞ÂùÄ‰πãÈó¥ÁöÑ‰∏ÄÁªÑÂçïÂêëË∑ØÂæÑ„ÄÇËøô‰∏™ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÊ°ÜÊû∂ÂæàÁÅµÊ¥ªÔºåÊúâÂèØËÉΩÊîØÊåÅËÆ∏Â§öÊúâË∂£ÁöÑWeb 3.0Áî®‰æã„ÄÇ

‰∏ãÈù¢Êàë‰ª¨‰ªãÁªç‰∏Ä‰∏™Êàë‰ª¨ÁâπÂà´ÊÑüÂÖ¥Ë∂£ÁöÑÂü∫‰∫éWeb 3.0ÁöÑÂç≥Êó∂ÈÄöËÆØÂ∫îÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÁöÑÊ¶ÇÂøµ„ÄÇCyberChat„ÄÇCyberChatÊúâÊúõÂú®Êú™Êù•Êàê‰∏∫Âü∫‰∫éCyberConnectÁöÑWeb 3.0Â∫îÁî®Áü©ÈòµÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™‰æãÂ≠ê„ÄÇ

**Êú™Êù•ÁöÑÊú∫‰ºöÔºöDID**

ÊØè‰∏™DIDÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊäΩË±°ÁöÑ„ÄÅÁã¨Á´ã‰∫éÂØÜÈí•ÁöÑ„ÄÅÁã¨Á´ã‰∫éÂå∫ÂùóÈìæÁöÑÊé•Âè£ÔºåÁî®‰∫éÂîØ‰∏ÄÂú∞ËØÜÂà´„ÄÅÁ≠æÁΩ≤ÂíåÂä†ÂØÜ‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåÂπ∂Â∞ÜËÆøÈóÆÊéßÂà∂ÂßîÊâòÁªôÊúçÂä°„ÄÇ

**CyberConnect DAO**

**DaoÊ≤ªÁêÜ**

CyberConnectÂçèËÆÆÁî±CyberConenctDAOÁÆ°ÁêÜÔºåÂÆÉÁî±$CYBER‰ª£Â∏ÅÊåÅÊúâ‰∫∫ÁªÑÊàê„ÄÇÁÆ°ÁêÜÂª∫ËÆÆÂ∞ÜÁªèËøá‰∏§‰∏™Èò∂ÊÆµ„ÄÇÁ¨¨‰∏ÄÊ≠•ÊòØÁî®SnapshotËøõË°åÁöÑÂÖ±ËØÜÊ£ÄÊü•„ÄÇ‰ªª‰ΩïÊèêËÆÆÈÉΩÈúÄË¶ÅÊúÄ‰ΩéÈó®ÊßõÁöÑ‰ª£Â∏ÅÊù•ÈÄöËøá„ÄÇÁ¨¨‰∫åÈò∂ÊÆµÊòØÊèêÊ°àÁöÑÂÆûÊñΩ„ÄÇÂè™ÊúâÈÄöËøáÁ¨¨‰∏ÄÈò∂ÊÆµÁöÑÊèêËÆÆÊâçËÉΩÊúÄÁªàÂú®ÂçèËÆÆ‰∏≠ÂÆûÊñΩ„ÄÇ‰ª£Á†ÅÂú®ÂÆûÊñΩÂâçÂøÖÈ°ªÁªèËøá‰∏ì‰∏ö‰∫∫Â£´ÁöÑÂÆ°Ê†∏ÔºåÂÆ°Ê†∏Ë¥πÁî®Â∞ÜÁî±Á§æÂå∫ÂêéÂ§áÂ∫ìÊä•ÈîÄ„ÄÇ

# Pools

There are two *pools* of blocks:

1. the private pool of blocks, meaning you can only see what you have created.‚Äî‚Äîthe grey stripe
2. the public pool of blocks(the blockverse), meaning you can see blocks generated by anyone who use the extension and choose ‚Äú`public`‚Äú. ‚Äî‚Äîthe orange stripe

# Buttons

In the public pool, there are 3 buttons: 

1. Archive 
2. IrrigationÔºàmeans ‚ÄúLike‚Äù)
3. Go to the context

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lSd_Nru2WPmxR0rP1c5A9.png?height=2744&width=4684)

# Search

You can search blocks by wallet address/ENS names, or by `#tags`

title: A step-by-step guide to creating a token with Encentive
body:
Click Have you ever wanted to create a token of your own? And it seemed like it was impossible to do so? I am here to let you know, that it is totally possible with Encentive

Encentive makes anyone be able to create any token with just a few clicks and I will be guiding you on how to go about it,

### A step-by-step guide to creating a token using Encentive:

* Visit- [encentive.io](https://encentive.io)
* 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Zpcu570DBR_l1erAyXuCG.png?height=860&width=1917)

Click on the dapp icon on the home page, as seen in the image above, and wait for it to load.

* 

![Click on the highlighted icon](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8W6j9o0uao73QCO6EdIcO.png?height=823&width=1614)

Click on the yellowish highlighted icon to switch between any chain you wish to create a token on.

Then connect your wallet to the dapp.

* 

![Click on the highlighted icon](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QeQIdIIQG12yuntIQ9eTf.png?height=807&width=1614)

Click on the Create token icon, to begin your journey, remember to approve the transaction through your metamask extension. 

Remember to keep some tokens depending on the blockchain for gas fee.

* 

![Fill in token info](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KQUKbcDBNBqC4FVA5DhmY.png?height=831&width=1865)

All you will have to do on this page is fill in some basic information about your token.

Once you are done, click on the Create icon and then approve the transaction.

* 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TW-nF9N0nPVp0TpABTVKh.png?height=625&width=1869)

Your created token will look like the one in the picture above.

You can then proceed to explore other options on the Encentive Dapp. Such as creating a liquidity pool etc.

* To get the contract address of your token, depending on the blockchain, go to its scan e.g [bscscan.com](https://bscscan.com), and scan your wallet address.
*  

![A token I created](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U0XH2Lm5hq2WJOw5uwHPt.png?height=468&width=1853)

The picture above shows the token I created using Encentive. 

Yours should be the same too depending on the parameters you filled in.

### As stated earlier, Encentive makes it very easy to create a token with few clicks. Create that token today.

title: products
body: In most cases, the advertised products are good and worth buying. But there are also cases where the effects or functions of a certain product are much exaggerated and it will definitely fool some people when they are attracted all at once and go to buy it. Since a product can only win the market through its quality and its long established fame, there‚Äôs every reason to believe that those fake or much exaggerated products will eventually lose their market shares and die out. Thus, we see that the market is selective and consumers are sensible in the long term.¬†In developed countries, there are strict censorship and supervising systems regarding advertising. If the advertisement put up by a company fails to honor the advertised effects, it would be termed as fraud, thus violating the law which could lead to really serious result. In most cases, the manufacturing company would be fined so heavily that it would be difficult for it to survive any longer.

¬†ETHÔºå‰∏äÂë®ÁúãÂà∞ËÄÅÁå´Ëå∂È¶ÜÁâπÂà´ÁâàÁöÑ„Ää[‰ª•Â§™ÂùäÔºåÊ≠£Âú®ÂèòÂæóË∂äÊù•Ë∂äÂç±Èô©ÔºÅ](#wechat_redirect)„ÄãËøôÁØáÊñáÁ´†ÁöÑ‰∫∫Â¶ÇÊûúÂõ†Ê≠§ËÄåÂèóÁõäÔºåÊàë‰ºöÂæàÈ´òÂÖ¥ÔºåÁÆóÊòØÁªôÁæ§ÊàêÂëòÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™Á¶èÂà©ÂêßÔºåËøô‰∏™ÊñáÁ´†ÁÆó‰∏çÂæóË∞à‰ª∑Ê†ºÔºåÂè™ÊòØË∞à‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈÄªËæëÔºåÂè™ÊòØÂ∫îÈ™åÂæóÂ§™Âø´‰∫Ü„ÄÇ‰ΩÜÂ§ßÂÆ∂‰πüËØ∑Ê≥®ÊÑèÔºåÂØπ‰∫é‰ª•Â§™ÂùäÊàë‰ª¨Âè™ÊòØÊöÇÊó∂ÂëäÂà´ÔºåÂπ∂‰∏çÊòØËøúÁ¶ªÔºåÊàëËÆ§‰∏∫‰ª•Â§™ÂùäÊú™Êù•‰æùÁÑ∂ÊúâÊú∫‰ºöÊàêÂäüÔºå‰ΩÜÊàë‰ª¨ÈúÄË¶ÅÂØªÊâæÂà∞ÂÆâÂÖ®ÁöÑËøõÂÖ•Âå∫Èó¥Ôºå‰ΩÜÊòØ‰∏çÊòØÁé∞Âú®ÔºåÊàëÊó†Ê≥ïÂà§Êñ≠Ôºå‰∏™‰∫∫ËÆ§‰∏∫ÂàÜÂèâ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁöÑ‰ΩôÊ≥¢Âπ∂Ê≤°ÊúâÂπ≥ÊÅØÔºåËÆ©‰ª•Â§™ÂùäÁªèÂèóÊõ¥Â§öÊó∂Èó¥ÁöÑËÄÉÈ™åÂπ∂Ê≤°Êúâ‰ªÄ‰πàÂùèÂ§Ñ„ÄÇ

title: 7 GitHub projects essential for every Javascript developer  üöÄ
body:
Javascript is so widely adopted that most developers can't avoid it entirely during the course of their careers. Sooner or later, you need to face JS, and when you do, you need to be ready with practical and fundamental concepts of the Javascript programming language.

So today, I want to share 7 amazing GitHub projects that will help you become a better Javascript developer. These GitHub projects are quite popular and can be a go-to resource for anyone looking to learn, and let's face it - Devs are always learning.ü§ì

So let's get started. üëä


---

Currently building [SigNoz](https://bit.ly/3A6k4an) - an open-source application performance monitoring tool. The front-end is built in Typescript and Reactjs.

Check out our GitHub repoüëá 
  
 

[https://github.com/SigNoz/signoz](https://github.com/SigNoz/signoz)

## 1. You don't know JS

> ‚≠ê Github stars: 141k

This repo is a series of books on core mechanisms of the Javascript language. The 2nd edition of the series is currently in progress, while the first edition is available and is entirely free to read online! 
 

[https://github.com/getify/You-Dont-Know-JS](https://github.com/getify/You-Dont-Know-JS)

 
 2. Javascript Algorithms

> ‚≠ê Github stars: 111k

This repo is an amazing resource for anyone wanting to get a firm understanding of algorithms and data structure. It contains JavaScript based examples of many popular algorithms and data structures. 
  
 

[https://github.com/trekhleb/javascript-algorithms](https://github.com/trekhleb/javascript-algorithms)

 
 3. 30 seconds of code

> ‚≠ê Github stars: 78.1k

This repo can be a super-booster to your JS workflow. It contains short Javascript code snippets for all your development needs. Once you get used to this, there's no looking back.üôá‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è 
  
 

[https://github.com/30-seconds/30-seconds-of-code](https://github.com/30-seconds/30-seconds-of-code)

## 4. Front-End Checklist

> ‚≠ê Github stars: 54.1k

There are a million things to take care of when you launch a website. So how do you ensure you have taken care of things that can break your product when it goes into production. Enter `Front-end Checklist`‚úÖ. It is an exhaustive list of all elements you need to have/test before launching your website / HTML page to production. 
  
 

[https://github.com/thedaviddias/Front-End-Checklist](https://github.com/thedaviddias/Front-End-Checklist)

[View on GitHub](https://github.com/thedaviddias/Front-End-Checklist)

## 5. Front End interview handbook

> ‚≠ê Github stars: 29.5k

This repo promises to make you go from zero to front-end interview hero even if you don't have prior interview experience. And, from the number of stargazers it has, it looks like it delivers on that promise. It has answers to every question in the very famous question bank **Front-end Job Interview Questions. 
  
 **

[https://github.com/yangshun/front-end-interview-handbook](https://github.com/yangshun/front-end-interview-handbook)

## 6. Web-Dev for Beginners

> ‚≠ê Github stars: 27.1k

This repo is maintained by Azure Cloud Advocates at Microsoft and offers a 12-week, 24-lesson curriculum all about JavaScript, CSS, and HTML basics. 
  
 

[https://github.com/microsoft/Web-Dev-For-Beginners](https://github.com/microsoft/Web-Dev-For-Beginners)

 
 7. Reactjs Interview Questions

> ‚≠ê Github stars: 14k

This repo has a list of top 500 ReactJS Interview Questions & Answers. 
  
 

[https://github.com/sudheerj/reactjs-interview-questions](https://github.com/sudheerj/reactjs-interview-questions)

 
  
 

[https://dev.to/ankit01oss/7-github-projects-essential-for-every-javascript-developer-258i](https://dev.to/ankit01oss/7-github-projects-essential-for-every-javascript-developer-258i)
